channel.title: Need help on error
channel.description: I need help on this error: [code]MagicOnItem.java:18: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (!p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:21: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:27: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(712); ^ MagicOnItem.java:40: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (!p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) ^ MagicOnItem.java:41: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client && !p.playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:44: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) ^ MagicOnItem.java:45: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client && p.playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:52: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(713); ^ MagicOnItem.java:67: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (!p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:70: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:76: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(713); ^ MagicOnItem.java:88: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (!p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 2) ^ MagicOnItem.java:89: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client && !p.playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:92: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (p.playerHasItemAmount(561, 2) ^ MagicOnItem.java:93: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client && p.playerHasItemAmount(554, 5)) { ^ MagicOnItem.java:100: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(713); ^[/code]

item.title: Need help on error
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

xstrxpurez:

all that error means… is that your using the code from a 508 server… you need to take out the p. …

No. “p” is used in 317. Using “p” is not just for 508s, you can use it in anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on error
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

it works, but now it gives this error:

client.java:19: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerItemAmountCount location: class client playerItemAmountCount = 0; ^ client.java:24: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerItemAmountCount location: class client playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i]; ^ client.java:26: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerItemAmountCount location: class client if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){ ^ MagicOnItem.java:27: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(712); ^ MagicOnItem.java:52: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(713); ^ MagicOnItem.java:76: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(713); ^ MagicOnItem.java:100: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client p.startAnimation(713); ^
i guess i need one for startanimation too right?

item.title: Need help on error
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

all this means the “playerhasitemamount()” void or int method doesnt exist; you need to add it, sec I’ll see if I can find it.

Found it:

public boolean playerHasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { //if(itemID == 0 || itemAmount == 0) return true; playerItemAmountCount = 0; for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++) { if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1) { playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i]; } if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){ return true;} } //return (itemAmount <= playerItemAmountCount); return true; }

and for the startanimation error,
FIRST, MAKE A BACKUP OF PLAYER.JAVA!

then find the public int getLevelForEP , select the entire public int, and paste this over it:

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp)
			return lvl;
	}
	return 0;
}
public int animationRequest = -1, animationWaitCycles = 0;
    protected boolean animationUpdateRequired = false;
public void startAnimation(int animIdx)
{
	animationRequest = animIdx;
	animationWaitCycles = 0;
}[/code]

Read full topic
